flawed_nl_solution:
He collects 25 leaves because 12 + 13 = <<12+13=25>>25
60% of them are yellow because 100 - 20 - 20 = <<100-20-20=60>>60
He collects 51 yellow leaves because 25 x 0.6 = <<25*0.6=51>>51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15.0, not 51.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
